title: Icehenge
description: An early novel from Science Fiction legend Kim Stanley Robinson, now available for the first time in Icehenge .On the North Pole of Pluto there stands an a huge circle of standing blocks of ice, built on the pattern of Earth's Stonehenge--but ten times the size, standing alone at the farthest reaches of the Solar System. What is it? Who came there to build it?The secret lies, perhaps, in the chaotic decades of the Martian Revolution, in the lost memories of those who have lived for centuries.
author: Kim Stanley Robinson
